scripts.gulp:project:clean: echo " >>>> Pokus >>> Check Current working Directory : >>>> [$(pwd)] " && ./.npm.scripts/project/clean.sh
scripts.gulp:project:dependencies:clean: echo " >>>> Pokus >>> Check Current working Directory : >>>> [$(pwd)] " && ./.npm.scripts/project/clean-dependencies.sh
scripts.gulp:project:dependencies: echo " >>>> Pokus >>> Check Current working Directory : >>>> [$(pwd)] " && ./.npm.scripts/project/dependencies.sh
scripts.gulp:project:spawn: echo " >>>> Pokus >>> Check Current working Directory : >>>> [$(pwd)] " && ./.npm.scripts/project/spawn.sh
scripts.gulp:project:scratch: echo " >>>> Pokus >>> Check Current working Directory : >>>> [$(pwd)] " && npm run gulp:project:clean && npm run gulp:project:dependencies:clean && npm run gulp:project:dependencies && npm run gulp:project:spawn
scripts.dev:0: echo " >>>> Pokus >>> Check Current working Directory : >>>> [$(pwd)] " && npm run gulp:transpile:debug && export NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm' && node --no-warnings --loader ts-node/esm ./bin/gulpfile.js
scripts.dev:1: echo " >>>> Pokus >>> Check Current working Directory : >>>> [$(pwd)] " && npm run gulp:transpile:debug && export NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings' && node --no-warnings ./bin/gulpfile.js
scripts.dev: echo " >>>> Pokus >>> Check Current working Directory : >>>> [$(pwd)] " && npm run gulp:clean && npm run lint && npm run gulp:transpile:debug && gulp showenv -f ./bin/gulpfile.js
scripts.dev:p: echo " >>>> Pokus >>> Check Current working Directory : >>>> [$(pwd)] " && npm run gulp:clean && npm run gulp:transpile:debug && export NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings' && node --no-warnings ./bin/gulp.pokus/index.js
